name: Counter-Strike Unreal
description:
A remake of Zombie Plague mode from Counter-Strike 1.6 made on the Unreal Engine 5

Zombies vs Humans Multiplayer

There are 4 maps and 12 weapons in this remake

  • de_dust2
    de_nuke
    de_aztec
    de_inferno
  • Ak47, AWP, Deagle, HE Grenade, Freeze Grenade, Light Grneade, Knife, M4A1, Mine Laser, MP5, M249, USP.
